usage_instructions:
1. First, run the CycleNet/Linear script to evaluate the Linear backbone on the Solar-Energy dataset: `sh /workspace/scripts/CycleNet/Linear-Input-96/solar.sh`
2. Then, run the CycleNet/MLP script to evaluate the MLP backbone on the Solar-Energy dataset: `sh /workspace/scripts/CycleNet/MLP-Input-96/solar.sh`
3. The scripts will automatically run experiments for all forecast horizons (96, 192, 336, 720) with 5 different random seeds (2024-2028) and output MSE and MAE metrics to the result.txt file.
4. Compare the MSE and MAE values between the Linear and MLP backbones to determine which performs better on the Solar-Energy forecasting task.
